github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Write all commit messages in Spanish from Spain.
Limit the first line to 72 characters or less.
Follow the conventional commit message format.
Use only the following commit types: 'fix' (bug fix), 'ref' (code refactor), 'feat' (new features), and 'misc' (if none of the previous apply).
If the change affects shell language files (.sh), the scope must be 'script'.
The first word of the description must start with a lowercase letter (except if it is an abbreviation, acronym, or similar).
The description must always end with a period.
